code: import Messages from'./message';import{panCheck,nameCheck}from'./method';export var panValidation=function panValidation(data){var isValid=true;var msg="";if(!data){msg=Messages.PERSONAL_PAGE.BLANK_PAN;isValid=false;}else if(panCheck(data)===false){msg=Messages.PERSONAL_PAGE.VALID_PAN;isValid=false;}else{msg="";isValid=true;}return{res:isValid,msg:msg};};export var panNameValidation=function panNameValidation(panName){var panNameVal="";if(panName===undefined){panNameVal="";}else{panNameVal=panName;}var isValid=true;var msg="";var nameReg=/^[a-z . A-Z-]+$/;if(!panNameVal){msg=Messages.PERSONAL_PAGE.BLANK_PAN_NAME;isValid=false;}else if(panNameVal.trim()==""){msg=Messages.PERSONAL_PAGE.VALID_PAN_NAME;isValid=false;}else if(!nameCheck(panNameVal)){msg=Messages.PERSONAL_PAGE.VALID_PAN_NAME;isValid=false;}else if(panNameVal.length<2){msg=Messages.PERSONAL_PAGE.MIN_PAN_NAME;isValid=false;}else{msg="";isValid=true;}return{res:isValid,msg:msg};};
